text:
Created attachment 31368
allow internal rel only with test case

XSLFSlideShow allow loads all relations including external resource (commonly not valid with wrong URI). This feature raises exception in many cases when creating XSLFSlideShow.

We can allow load INTERNAL embedded relations by default.
creator: hong-thai.nguyen@polyspot.com
